pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implementing Computational Models of Attentional Selectivity // A set of methods to simulate from and fit computational models of attentional selectivity. The package implements the dual-stage two-phase (DSTP) model of Hbner et al. (2010) doi:10.1037/a0019471, and the shrinking spotlight (SSP) model of White et al. (2011) doi:10.1016/j.cogpsych.2011.08.001.
